alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 6:53PM CST until March 06 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Jacks Fork at Eminence affecting Shannon County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County. Current River near Powder Mill affecting Shannon County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Current River near Powder Mill. * WHEN...Until late Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 13.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 PM CST Friday was 13.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.1 feet on 03/20/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
